original_text: and behold, a great wind came across the wilderness and struck the four corners of the house, and it fell upon the young people, and they are dead, and I alone have escaped to tell you.”
korean_text: 거친 들에서 큰 바람이 와서 집 네 모퉁이를 치매 그 청년들 위에 무너지므로 그들이 죽었나이다 나만 홀로 피하였으므로 주인께 아뢰러 왔나이다 한지라

sentences.original_text: a great wind came across the wilderness
and struck the four corners of the house,
and it fell upon the young people,
and I alone have escaped to tell you.”
sentences.korean_translation: 나만이 살아남아 당신에게 이 말을 전하러 왔습니다.
